statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 21 \\ 6 \\ 21 \\ -1 \\ 13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -21 \\ 8 \\ -39 \\ 1 \\ -19 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
